item.title: Engineering Culture & Leadership
item.description:
As the first ML Engineer in the region, I quickly adapted to the team and became one of the trusted voices in technical decision-making.

Bridging the Gap

Joining as the first engineer for LATAM, my first goal was simple: prove the level of software quality and delivery we could achieve from the region. And we did.

First Task: Deploying a Ray Serving PoC

My first assignment was to deploy a PoC using Ray Serve.
Not a bad start especially considering that the long-term goal was to standardize all deployments on Kubernetes. Luckily, we had a dedicated team managing our EKS clusters, so I focused on defining the ideal workflow:
